title: Virtual Reality Borobudur
desc: Developed in collaboration with KBRI Hungary to showcase Indonesian cultural heritage in VR (Unity, Oculus Quest 2). Role: Project Manager.

title: TripPlanner
desc: A web application to plan and organize trips with customizable itineraries.

desc: Mobile version of TripPlanner built with Flutter for seamless travel planning.

title: NgajiYuk
desc: A mobile app to support Quran recitation and study in an interactive way.

title: Web Inventory System
desc: Built with React and Node.js to manage stock efficiently.
